actions.recommendation: Abnormal hearing, please see hearing report.
Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram.

Raised insulin: when the pancreas makes more insulin to process high levels of carbohydrates in the blood.Diabetes develops when pancreas cant make large amounts of insulin needed for normal blood sugar, reduce carb intake
Stiff hand joint in the morning, better with use. Consider testing for inflammatory arthritis.

Increased abdominal circumference is not limited to fat under the skin but also fat around the organs of your abdomen, it's linked with Type 2 diabetes, high BP& breathing problems. Eat whole unprocessed foods, practice good sleep hygiene, and try to manage your stress
